SubFile¶

class gwasr.helpers.sub_file.SubFile(name, universe='vanilla', description='')¶

Bases: object

Class to create a .sub file to be submitted with condor_submit.

Parameters
namestr

name of the .sub file

universestr

universe (default : vanilla)

descriptionstr

description string of the sub file (default : empty)

addBlankLine(self)¶

Add blank line to .sub file.

addExecutable(self, exec_name)¶

Add executable to .sub file.

Parameters
exec_namestr

executable name

addArguments(self, args)¶

Add arguments to .sub file.

Parameters
argsstr

arguments as a single string

addAccountingGroupInfo(self, group, user)¶

Add accounting_group and accounting_group_user to .sub file.

Parameters
groupstr

accounting group

userstr

accounting group user

addSpecs(self, ncpu, memory)¶

Add request_cpus and request_memory to .sub file.

Parameters
ncpuint

number of cpus

memoryint

requested memory in Mb

addLogs(self, output, error, to_append=[])¶

Add output and error to .sub file.

Parameters
outputstr

path to the output folder

errorstr

path to the error folder

to_appendlist of str

str to be appended to output and error file names

save(self)¶

Save .sub file to name.
